## Type of Change
- [ ] New skill
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Skill improvement

## Skill Checklist (if adding new skill)
- [ ] YAML frontmatter complete (name, description, license, category, tags)
- [ ] `biomodals_script` specified (if design tool)
- [ ] Modal execution instructions included
- [ ] Local installation alternative provided
- [ ] Parameter table with defaults
- [ ] Output format documented
- [ ] Sample output included
- [ ] Decision tree for tool selection
- [ ] Related skills cross-referenced
- [ ] Under 500 lines
- [ ] Added to marketplace.json
